base_prompt: Solo Leveling manwha style, painterly artwork, dark fantasy, detailed, high quality
negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, deformed, watermark, text, signature

prompt_templates.monsters: Solo Leveling manwha style, painterly artwork of a {name}, {description}, gate rank {gate_rank}, dark fantasy creature design, detailed, menacing, {tags}
prompt_templates.equipment: Solo Leveling manwha style, painterly artwork of {name}, {description}, {equipment_type} illustration, detailed, professional item art, {tags}
prompt_templates.relics: Solo Leveling manwha style, painterly artwork of {name}, magical item, {rarity} rarity, {description}, glowing effects, ethereal energy, detailed, {tags}
prompt_templates.jobs: Solo Leveling manwha style, painterly artwork, {name} job class concept art, {description}, character class design, detailed, {tags}
